# Noises

Various noise patterns and textures.

## Available Noises

| Module | Functions | Description |
|--------|-----------|-------------|
| [Binaries](binaries/index.md) | binary | Binary noise patterns |
| [Narrowbands](narrowbands/index.md) | narrowband | Narrowband noise |
| [Naturals](naturals/index.md) | brown, one_over_f, pink | Natural noise patterns (pink, brown, 1/f) |
| [Whites](whites/index.md) | white | White noise patterns |
